str2: When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make clear (visible, manifest), make known. From phaneros; to render apparent.
Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To make clear (visible, manifest), make known. From phaneros; to render apparent.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
